Mission Orders

The ksharans in the Necromancer Tomb are threatening the entire area.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:471#105#ksharan battleragers}, {@LinkCreature:471#54#magisters}, {@LinkCreature:471#55#berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:471#56#myrmidons}, {@LinkCreature:471#5#destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:471#6#defenders}.

Report to the nearest coordinator when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
